name: Scary Manager In Supermarket
description:
A scary thief entered into the supermarket and he is stealing things from supermarket shops. So the supermarket management hired a scary manager in the supermarket to scare thief.
Are you ready to take part in this awesome thief, manager games where scary thief will try to steal thing from supermarket to escape himself from scary manager in supermarket games.
Be speedy and use traps to save yourself from scary manager

Download it now for free!
